synonyms: śrī-hari—Lord Hari; śaṅkha—conch; cakra—disc; padma—lotus; gadā—club; kara—in the hand; śrī-kṛṣṇa—Lord Kṛṣṇa; śaṅkha—conch; gadā—club; padma—lotus; cakra—disc; kara—in the hands.
translation: "Śrī Hari holds the conch, disc, lotus and club. Lord Śrī Kṛṣṇa holds the conch, club, lotus and disc.
